name: Pool Master - 8 Ball Challenge
description:
Welcome to the Pool Master - 8 Ball Pool Challenge game ,Pool Master is a CLASSIC 8 ball game for you to spend leisure times, Wanna become a pool master ? Come and play POOL MASTER now! It’s a paradise for pool lovers

HOW TO PLAY
1)VS Mode : 1-VS-1
Play against the Player with standard 8 ball rules. Touch the screen, adjust the direction and intensity, strike the ball.
2) SINGLE Player Mode :
You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. and some levels you must complete challenge within limited time

Game Features:
● 1-VS-1 Online mode
● Offline Single mode
● Classic 8 Ball gameplay
● Realistic 3D ball animation
● Super smooth controls
● Customize your pool cues
● Daily rewards
Download Pool Master - 8 Ball Pool Challenge now and have fun!
